title: Can Primož Roglič Now Race Against and Beat Jumbo-Visma at the Tour de France?
content:
With a possible move to Bora-Hansgrohe, the Slovenian wants outright leadership, but he's leaving the team he helped transform into a powerhouse. Can he now beat the Killer Bees?

Read the full article at Can Primož Roglič Now Race Against and Beat Jumbo-Visma at the Tour de France? on Velo.
author: ahood
